items.sentence: Tom\'s father died before he was born and his mother died shortly after he was born.
Contact your local police if you have any information on Tom Jackson\'s whereabouts.
Even though Tom has had way too much to drink already, he\'s ordering another drink.
Tom wanted to meet Mary\'s family, but Mary didn\'t think that would be a good idea.
Tom fell asleep on the train and missed the station that he was going to get off at.
